document_name: 2011.10.17 Concept Note - Anti-Corruption Social Media Kosovo.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/KOS/00057801/2011.10.17 Concept Note - Anti-Corruption Social Media Kosovo.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
Output 1: Technical and capacity development support to anti-corruption bodies in Kosovo
Output 2: Strengthened institutional integrity in Kosovo
Output 3: Increased public awareness on corruption

project_descr: The overall objective of this project is to provide Kosovo's citizens with an opportunity to proactively engage in enhancing corruption control.
